Texts.Eng: As expected, my peers accepted their loss graciously, and we all retired to the mess hall for dinner. It was a pleasant feast; a reward for our first day of the trials, perhaps. I feel so at home here, amongst likeminded Flightless, no talk of the Grounded, just devotion to Kluex.

Physical training began today. Myself and five other Avian youths. Obstacle courses, races, all manner of challenges. At the end of the day, we were awarded a score. I came top of my class! I was so proud.
